scripts.push: s3cmd --config=$HOME/.s3cfg_prismatik sync --delete-removed -r --acl-public --exclude 'git/*' ./build/ s3://blog.prismatik.com.au && slackcli -t xoxp-4159189041-8876450160-9979420354-7ef277 -h prismatik-online -u Blog-Bot -i https://i.imgur.com/zIQ92.jpg -m 'The Blog has been updated; check it out! https://blog.prismatik.com.au/'
